meeting_info.location: Oak Cliff Municipal Center, Room 300, 320 E. Jefferson Boulevard, Dallas, TX 75203

agenda_items.title: Review and Approval of the Minutes
agenda_items.description: Review and Approval of the Minutes from the March 5, 2024 Special Called Meeting.

agenda_items.title: Review and Recommendations on Code Amendments
agenda_items.description: Review and make recommendations regarding amendments to Chapter 52 (Administrative Procedures), Chapter 53 (International Building Code), and Chapter 57 (International Residential Code) of the Dallas City Code. Change the name of Chapter 57 from Dallas OneÂ­ and Two-Family Dwelling Code to Dallas One- to Eight-Family Dwelling Code.
